data.title: Bus Routes Information
data.meta_description: Yarra Valley Grammar have dedicated bus routes to & from school. Click here to see your bus route.
data.text:
Location & Buses

Yarra Valley Grammar is located in Ringwood, in the eastern suburbs of Melbourne, Australia.

The School is a single-campus, co-educational Independent school set on 30 hectares of grounds overlooking the Yarra Valley and picturesque Dandenong Ranges.

View the School campus map here.

Our School is well served by a network of private charter buses.

Bus Services - Private Charters

AM routes

PM routes

You can unclick a route to remove it from the map.

Hover your mouse over the bus symbol to show address and the expected time of arrival.

Balwyn North via Doncaster, Box Hill North & Blackburn, Nunawading & Mitcham – Black route

This service commences at Balwyn Road on Doncaster Road and operates via Park + Ride, Tram Road, Station Street, Dorking Road, Springfield Road, Middleborough Road, Whitehorse Road/Maroondah Highway to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Templestowe via Warrandyte – Blue route

This service commences at the 7-Eleven on Anderson Street and operates via Porter Street, Heidelberg-Warrandyte Road, Yarra Street then direct to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Mount Waverley via Glen Waverley, Forest Hill, Nunawading, Mitcham & Ringwood North – Brown route

This service commences at Regent Street on Waverley Road and operates via Springvale Road, Maroondah Highway and Warrandyte Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Surrey Hills via Box Hill South, Blackburn South, Blackburn, Blackburn North & Nunawading – Burgundy route

This service commences at Thistle Street on Union Road and operates via Riversdale Road, Eley Road, Blackburn Road, Surrey Road, Springfield Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Greensborough via Doncaster East & The Pines – Cyan route

This service commences at Greensborough Station on Para Road and operates express to Andersons Creek Road and The Pines Shopping Centre then express to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Templestowe Lower via Doncaster East, Donvale & Mitcham – Gold route

This service commences at Rosemary Street on High Street and operates via Lynnwood Parade, King Street, Doncaster Road, Tunstall Square and Mitcham Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Bulleen via Templestowe Lower, Doncaster, Doncaster East, Donvale & Park Orchards – Green route

This service commences on Manningham Road at Ronald Avenue and operates via Williamsons Road, Westfield Doncaster, Doncaster Road, Mitcham Road and Park Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Rowville via Scoresby, Wantirna South, Wantirna, Ringwood, Heathmont & Ringwood East – Grey route

This service commences on Sovereign Crest Boulevard at Greenhaven Court and operates via Napoleon Road, Kelletts Road, Stud Road, Boronia Road, Wantirna Road, Canterbury Road, Heathmont Station and Dublin Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Donvale via Park Orchards – Lime route

This service commences at Parklands Close on Springvale Road and operates via Mitcham Road and Park Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Doncaster via Doncaster East, Blackburn North & Nunawading – Magenta route

This service commences at Ivan Street on George Street and operates via Victoria Street, Wetherby Road, Springfield Road, Springvale Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Mount Waverley via Burwood East, Blackburn North, Doncaster East, Park Orchards & Warranwood – Mauve route

This service commences at High Street Road on Blackburn Road and operates via Surrey Road, Andersons Creek Road, Reynolds Road, Knees Road and Wonga Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Healesville via Yarra Glen, Coldstream, Lilydale, Chirnside Park & Croydon North – Orange Route

This service commences on Healesville-Kinglake Road at Yarra Valley Tourist Railway and operates via Healesville-Yarra Glen Road, Old Healesville Road, Bell Street Service Road, Melba Highway, Maroondah Highway, Lilydale Station, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and Croydon North to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence and terminates in Green Street.

Kangaroo Ground via Eltham, Research, North Warrandyte & Warrandyte – Pink route

This service commences at 36 Kangaroo Ground-Warrandyte Road and operates via Graham Road, Eltham Station, Main Road, Research-Warrandyte Road, Yarra Street, Ringwood-Warrandyte Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in a different sequence and terminates at Mount Pleasant Road.

Balwyn North via Mont Albert, Box Hill, Blackburn, Forest Hill, Vermont & Ringwood North – Purple route

This service commences at Balwyn Leisure Centre on Belmore Road and operates via Union Road, Whitehorse Road, Station Street, Canterbury Road, Heatherdale Road, Loughnan Road and Wonga Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Templestowe Lower via Templestowe, Doncaster East, Park Orchards & Ringwood North- Red route

This service commences on Thompsons Road at Birchwood Avenue and operates via Foote Street, Reynolds Road, Stintons Road, Park Road, Milne Road and Tortice Drive to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Knoxfield via Ferntree Gully, Boronia, Wantirna, Vermont & Mitcham - Teal route

This service commences on Ferntree Gully Road at Kathryn Road and operates via Dorset Road, Boronia Station, Boronia Road and Mitcham Road to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Rowville via Wantirna South, Glen Waverley, Vermont South & Vermont – Yellow route

This service commences at Stud Park Shopping Centre on Stud Road and operates via High Street Road, Westlands Road, Camelot Drive, Hanover Road and Terrara Road then direct to Yarra Valley Grammar.

The after school bus leaves from 3.40pm. The PM route travels the same roads but in an alternate sequence.

Bus application form

Bus Services – Public Buses

Both public school buses and contract school buses service Yarra Valley Grammar. These buses are provided by the Department of Education in conjunction with PTV and local bus companies. Some morning and afternoon routes vary slightly and it is essential to check exact details. Contact details for each bus company are provided.

Ringwood Station

School bus 2553 - AM leaves bay 670 at Ringwood Station and travels via Maroondah Highway to Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar, then on to Luther College.

School bus 2562 – PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar and travels to Ringwood Station.

For further details visit www.venturabus.com.au

PTV bus (route 380) leaves Ringwood Station regularly and travels in clockwise and anti-clockwise directions near Yarra Valley Grammar. The closest PTV stops are Warranwood Rd/Bemboka Rd (Warranwood) and Plymouth Rd/Bemboka Rd (Croydon Hills) which are just beyond the roundabout.

For further details visit www.ptv.vic.gov.au

Croydon Station

PTV bus (route 380) leaves Croydon Station regularly and travels in clockwise and anti-clockwise directions near Yarra Valley Grammar. The closest PTV stops are Warranwood Rd/Bemboka Rd (Warranwood) and Plymouth Rd/Bemboka Rd (Croydon Hills) which are just beyond the roundabout.

For further details visit www.ptv.vic.gov.au

Mountain Gate Shopping Centre

School bus 2571 - AM commences at Mountain Gate SC/Ferntree Gully Rd (Ferntree Gully) and travels via Boronia, Wantirna, Heathmont, Ringwood East and Tintern Grammar to Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar then on to Luther College.

School bus 2623 - PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar via Ringwood East to Tintern Grammar.

School bus 2624 - PM leaves Tintern Grammar via Ringwood East, Heathmont, Wantirna, Wantirna South and Bayswater to Mountain Gate SC/Ferntree Gully Rd (Ferntree Gully).

For further details visit www.venturabus.com.au

Wonga Park

School bus 2558 – AM commences at Exeter Road, Croydon North and travels via Wonga Park and Luther College to Kalinda Road, Yarra Valley Grammar then on to Tintern Grammar, Ringwood Secondary and Aquinas College.

School bus 2633 – PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar and travels via Luther College, Wonga Park and Croydon North to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.

School route 2603 – PM leaves Tintern Grammar to Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar and travels via Luther College, Wonga Park and Croydon North to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.

For further details visit www.venturabus.com.au

Montrose

School bus 3422 - AM commences at Old Coach Rd/Mt Dandenong Tourist Rd (Montrose) and travels via Kilsyth and Croydon to Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar then on to Luther College.

School route 3423 - PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar and travels via Luther College, Croydon, Kilsyth and Montrose to Regina St/Cambridge Rd (Kilsyth).

For further details visit www.venturabus.com.au

Healesville

McKenzie’s (School Bus Route S378) – AM commences at Don Road, Healesville and travels via Yarra Glen, Coldstream, Lilydale Station and Luther College to Yarra Valley Grammar then on to Melbourne Rudolf Steiner School.

McKenzie’s (School Bus Route S378) – PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar via Luther College to Lilydale Station, Coldstream and Yarra Glen to Healesville.

For further details visit www.ptv.vic.gov.au

Warburton

Martyrs Bus Service (Route 683) - AM commences in Warburton and travels via Yarra Junction, Seville and Lilydale Station to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre. The bus extends to a school route which travels to Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College.

Martyrs Bus Service (Route 683) – PM leaves Foundation Drive, Yarra Valley Grammar via Luther College to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre. Buses run frequently from Chirnside Park Shopping Centre to Warburton via Lilydale Station, Seville and Yarra Junction.

For further details visit www.ptv.vic.gov.au
